name: Cosmotion
description:
MAKE SURE YOU PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!

Battle enemy spaceships, then make them a part of yours!  Defeat enemies and survive as long as you can.  If you become strong enough, you may be able to defeat the ultimate enemy!  Be careful though, every part you add to your ship will slow you down, so choose carefully when to pick up parts.

We'd love to see screenshots of you battling the boss!

Design/Programming:

Andrew Thomas

Shawn Bauer

Ayden Walker

Ken Martinez

Music by Dark Fantasy Studios. Used under license.
